Report an issue

Issue tracker

We welcome issue reports (bugs, improvements, new feature requests, …) in our issue tracker:

Show the JIRA issue tracker.

Log in and click on the button Create Issue to report a bug, improvement or feature request.

Pull requests on GitHub

Want to fix the issue yourself? Fork the git repository and send in a pull request. We usually process all pull requests within a few days.

Show the open pull requests.
